name: MindView Template
summary: Learn about .MVTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The MVTX template is designed to make it easier for users to access and replicate often-used mind maps. The application comes with default templates but you can also create your own custom templates.

description: Template created and used by MindView, an application used to visually brainstorm, organize, and present ideas; stores a layout of a mind map that is intended to be used multiple times.
